title: i have never had any missions
body: my friend told me about missions in lol so i went on and looked their is nothing their i have never completed any so why are their no missions plz if you have any info it i would appreciate the  help

replies.body: It's likely that you haven't logged in while any missions were active. In order to do the missions, you need to log in at least once while the event is going on so that they activate for you. Since this most recent Arcade Event ended on the 24th, you won't see those missions at this point. If you own Ornn, there is currently a mission involving using him though!
